Developer tools

Not longer advertised here due to concerns. If you are interested, poke around the source directory to find them.

Note that pages on this domain use goatcounter.com for privacy-friendly analytics. Basic information about your visit and your browser is recorded to gauge interest and guide development. No personal information is recorded, no fingerprinting is performed, and recorded data are only available to the author as aggregate statistics. You can "opt out" of analytics by blocking the gc.zgo.at domain with a content blocker, e.g. uBlock Origin, but as a very privacy-conscious person myself, I don't believe that's warranted.
